mapper.sql: id as id , areaId as areaId , universityId as universityId , majorId as majorId , year as year , batch as batch , admissionBatchId as admissionBatchId , universityMajorType as universityMajorType , planEnrollingNumber as planEnrollingNumber , realEnrollingNumber as realEnrollingNumber , lengthOfSchooling as lengthOfSchooling , schoolFee as schoolFee , highestScore as highestScore , highestPrecedence as highestPrecedence , lowestScore as lowestScore , lowestPrecedence as lowestPrecedence , averageScore as averageScore , averagePrecedence as averagePrecedence , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , isDelete as isDelete
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_university_major_enrolling ( areaId, universityId, majorId, year, batch, admissionBatchId, universityMajorType, planEnrollingNumber, realEnrollingNumber, lengthOfSchooling, schoolFee, highestScore, highestPrecedence, lowestScore, lowestPrecedence, averageScore, averagePrecedence, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, isDelete ) VALUES ( #{areaId}, #{universityId}, #{majorId}, #{year}, #{batch}, #{admissionBatchId}, #{universityMajorType}, #{planEnrollingNumber}, #{realEnrollingNumber}, #{lengthOfSchooling}, #{schoolFee}, #{highestScore}, #{highestPrecedence}, #{lowestScore}, #{lowestPrecedence}, #{averageScore}, #{averagePrecedence}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{isDelete} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_university_major_enrolling
areaId = #{areaId},
universityId = #{universityId},
majorId = #{majorId},
year = #{year},
batch = #{batch},
admissionBatchId = #{admissionBatchId},
universityMajorType = #{universityMajorType},
planEnrollingNumber = #{planEnrollingNumber},
realEnrollingNumber = #{realEnrollingNumber},
lengthOfSchooling = #{lengthOfSchooling},
schoolFee = #{schoolFee},
highestScore = #{highestScore},
highestPrecedence = #{highestPrecedence},
lowestScore = #{lowestScore},
lowestPrecedence = #{lowestPrecedence},
averageScore = #{averageScore},
averagePrecedence = #{averagePrecedence},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
isDelete = #{isDelete},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_university_major_enrolling
areaId = #{map.areaId},
universityId = #{map.universityId},
majorId = #{map.majorId},
year = #{map.year},
batch = #{map.batch},
admissionBatchId = #{map.admissionBatchId},
universityMajorType = #{map.universityMajorType},
planEnrollingNumber = #{map.planEnrollingNumber},
realEnrollingNumber = #{map.realEnrollingNumber},
lengthOfSchooling = #{map.lengthOfSchooling},
schoolFee = #{map.schoolFee},
highestScore = #{map.highestScore},
highestPrecedence = #{map.highestPrecedence},
lowestScore = #{map.lowestScore},
lowestPrecedence = #{map.lowestPrecedence},
averageScore = #{map.averageScore},
averagePrecedence = #{map.averagePrecedence},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},

WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_university_major_enrolling ( areaId, universityId, majorId, year, batch, admissionBatchId, universityMajorType, planEnrollingNumber, realEnrollingNumber, lengthOfSchooling, schoolFee, highestScore, highestPrecedence, lowestScore, lowestPrecedence, averageScore, averagePrecedence, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, isDelete ) VALUES ( #{map.areaId}, #{map.universityId}, #{map.majorId}, #{map.year}, #{map.batch}, #{map.admissionBatchId}, #{map.universityMajorType}, #{map.planEnrollingNumber}, #{map.realEnrollingNumber}, #{map.lengthOfSchooling}, #{map.schoolFee}, #{map.highestScore}, #{map.highestPrecedence}, #{map.lowestScore}, #{map.lowestPrecedence}, #{map.averageScore}, #{map.averagePrecedence}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.isDelete} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, areaId
, universityId
, majorId
, year
, batch
, admissionBatchId
, universityMajorType
, planEnrollingNumber
, realEnrollingNumber
, lengthOfSchooling
, schoolFee
, highestScore
, highestPrecedence
, lowestScore
, lowestPrecedence
, averageScore
, averagePrecedence
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, isDelete
FROM zgk_university_major_enrolling
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
AND universityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityId} , '%')
AND majorId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorId} , '%')
AND year like CONCAT('%', #{condition.year} , '%')
AND batch like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batch} , '%')
AND admissionBatchId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.admissionBatchId} , '%')
AND universityMajorType like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityMajorType} , '%')
AND planEnrollingNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.planEnrollingNumber} , '%')
AND realEnrollingNumber like CONCAT('%', #{condition.realEnrollingNumber} , '%')
AND lengthOfSchooling like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lengthOfSchooling} , '%')
AND schoolFee like CONCAT('%', #{condition.schoolFee} , '%')
AND highestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.highestScore} , '%')
AND highestPrecedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.highestPrecedence} , '%')
AND lowestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lowestScore} , '%')
AND lowestPrecedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lowestPrecedence} , '%')
AND averageScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averageScore} , '%')
AND averagePrecedence like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averagePrecedence} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND isDelete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isDelete} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
